## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                        | Description                   | Default value |
|---------------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| REPOSITORY_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| REPOSITORY_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
